an5.4:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
an5.4:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu assaddho hoti, ahiriko hoti, anottappi hoti, kusito hoti, duppanno hoti.
an5.4:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
an5.4:2.1: Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu yathabhatam nikkhitto evam sagge.
an5.4:2.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddho hoti, hirima hoti, ottappi hoti, araddhaviriyo hoti, pannava hoti.
an5.4:2.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu yathabhatam nikkhitto evam sagge”ti.
